CustomField.description: This field gives the month name for different record types.
CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Actual_AUS' && NOT(ISBLANK(Posting_Date__c)) , CASE( MONTH( Posting_Date__c ) ,1, "Jan",2, "Feb",3, "Mar",4, "Apr",5, "May",6, "Jun",7, "Jul",8, "Aug",9, "Sep",10, "Oct",11, "Nov",12, "Dec","") & "-" & Campaign_Year__c , IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Committed_AUS' && NOT(ISBLANK(Posting_Date__c)) , CASE( MONTH( Posting_Date__c ) ,1, "Jan",2, "Feb",3, "Mar",4, "Apr",5, "May",6, "Jun",7, "Jul",8, "Aug",9, "Sep",10, "Oct",11, "Nov",12, "Dec","") & "-" & Campaign_Year__c , IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Forecast' && NOT(ISNULL(TEXT(Forecast_Month__c))), TEXT(Forecast_Month__c)& "-" & Campaign_Year__c, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Monthly_Budget_AUS' && NOT(ISNULL(TEXT(Budget_Month__c))), TEXT( Budget_Month__c ) & "-" & Campaign_Year__c, IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Monthly_Plan_AUS' && NOT(ISNULL(TEXT(Planning_Month__c))), TEXT( Planning_Month__c) & "-" & Campaign_Year__c, '')))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field gives the month name for different record types.
CustomField.label: Consolidated Period
